overview: To put it plainly, Memorial Day 2000 is the finest find in the history of FOUND stuff. MD2000 is a home video which surfaced at a yard sale in West Michigan. It's documentary filmmaking at its purest and rawest. An inside job, never self-conscious since it was never intended for you to see. By turns hilarious and alarming, affectionate and absurd, spectacular and devastating.
tagline: The fuckin' whip-shit of all fuckin' shitter-bongers!
title: Memorial Day 2000
